document_data.name: ''Rain Dancer''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rain Dancer''''' was a minor [[enchanted]] [[staff]] from the [[Emerald Grove]] in the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Description: ''Rain Dancer'' was a pale wooden staff crowned with a tear-shaped [[topaz]] [[gem]]. The weapon was always cool to the touch.
document_data.Powers: The staff's wielder could cast the ''[[create water]]'' [[spell]] at will.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Arron]], a [[halfling]] [[druid]] merchant from the Emerald Grove in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
